tools.content: Task planning tools (request_planning, add_tasks_to_request) support dynamic task creation with priorities and due dates. Priority values: HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW.
Task execution tools (mark_task_done, approve_task_completion) integrate with MLflow for metric tracking. Performance data feeds into the RL reward function.
Task monitoring tools (get_next_task, open_task_details) provide real-time status updates and support task prioritization based on RL policy.

project_templates.content: Web Development Template: Includes task patterns for frontend, backend, testing, and deployment phases. Supports React, Vue, Angular projects with customizable CI/CD steps.
Data Science Template: Workflow patterns for data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment. Includes MLOps best practices and experiment tracking.
Mobile App Template: Task patterns for iOS/Android development, including UI/UX, native features, testing, and app store deployment steps.

tool_integrations.content: MLflow integration uses PostgreSQL backend for metrics storage and ./mlflow-artifacts for artifact storage. Dashboards update every 5 seconds.
GitOps integration enables automated workflow updates based on repository events. Supports GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and custom CI/CD pipelines.
Jira/Trello integration synchronizes tasks and subtasks with external project management tools. Supports bidirectional status updates.

integration.content: MLflow integration uses PostgreSQL backend for metrics storage and ./mlflow-artifacts for artifact storage. Dashboards update every 5 seconds.
Error handling integrates with notification system for critical failures. Circuit breaker opens after 5 consecutive failures.

error_handling.content: Circuit breaker pattern with exponential backoff retry strategy. Opens after 5 consecutive failures, half-opens after 60 seconds.
Dead letter queue pattern for failed tasks with automated retry scheduling and manual intervention options.

performance.content: Performance metrics tracked: task_execution_time, error_rate, resource_usage, completion_status, workflow_throughput, agent_response_time.
Resource monitoring thresholds: CPU usage < 80%, memory usage < 70%, active tasks < 100, queue length < 50.
